incidents.name: Cloudflare services functioning normally in Spain, Portugal, Andorra, and France

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We have routed some traffic out of this region to ensure our services continue to function normally. We will continue to monitor this situation and will provide further updates as it develops.

Cloudflare is aware of the widespread power issues in Spain, Portugal, Andorra, and France. All Cloudflare services are online and functioning normally in the region.  We will continue to monitor the situation and take appropriate action.
Cloudflare has resolved the infrastructure issues in Amsterdam. Full connectivity has been restored for Cloudflare Network Interconnect customers.

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - CDN Cache Purge

incident_updates.body: Cloudflare single-file cache purging (purge by URL) called via the Dashboard/API is running up to 60 minutes behind only on the China Network. More updates to follow.
